https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6wtR27907EWUseT3XNWQQQ4Qn42.jpg Clio befriends Fred, a homeless former jazz singer down on his luck. They form a special bond over music, and Clio, having just lost her own father, helps Fred reconnect with his own daughter, just in time for Christmas. A Christmas Winter Song
